data.description:
Make Mycroft repeat whatever you want, Turn Mycroft into a parrot. Speak a phrase and listen to it repeated

Repeats recent audio transcriptions and text to speech outputs

* "Repeat what you just said"
* "Repeat that"
* "Can you repeat that?"
* "What...
examples: Tell me what I just said.
repeat Once upon a midnight dreary, while I pondered, weak and weary, Over many a quaint and curious volume of forgotten lore
speak I can say anything you'd like!
data.name: Parrot Skill
